DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose extension study ass long-term safety tolerability preladenant participant parent study NCT01155466 [ P04938 ] NCT01227265 [ P07037 ] moderate severe Parkinson 's Disease ( PD ) . The study also characterize long-term efficacy preladenant participant PD . Participants continue receive stable regimen levodopa ( L-dopa ) plus adjunct medication study prescribed physician . Several class adjunct medication may use , include Amantadine , anticholinergic , dopa decarboxylase inhibitor , dopamine agonist .
